snippet.title: FDS ファイナルコマンド 赤い要塞 Final Commando: Akai Yousai
snippet.description:
This is a video walkthrough / playthrough / runthrough / etc of the Famicom Disk System game Akai Yousai, better known for it's US counterpart for the NES: Jackal.

There are quite a few differences between the two games.  This one doesn't have the first stage the NES version had, and all the level layouts were actually a bit different as well.  Even one of the bosses is different (in the name version, the ship is sitting in the water in a horizontal line, while here it's vertical).

After beating a stage, you don't get a screen based on whether or not you died in the level or passed it without getting hit.  The last level I also quite shorter than the NES versions last level.

But even with all these changes, it was no match for me.  I had played Jackal a ton of times back in the day (it was one of my favorite games I owned), so a game where it's a bit less than what I consider normal was simply too easy.  It was still fun though.
